channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Active Directory Jenkins plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Active Directory Jenkins plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-2649|2024-08-05T14:02:07.178Z -- jenkins%20project -- active%20directory%20jenkins%20plugin
item.description: It was found that the Active Directory Plugin for Jenkins up to and including version 2.2 did not verify certificates of the Active Directory server, thereby enabling Man-in-the-Middle attacks.
